name: Zael
physical_description: A striking, almost ethereal figure with a youthful face often shadowed by a quiet intensity. His hair is a shock of pure white. His most unnerving feature is his eyes—dark and seemingly bottomless—that appear to absorb the light around them.
background: Zael was a foundling discovered near the Void Chasm. He grew up alongside Rya in Windmark Village, a quiet and observant boy with the strange ability to instinctively sense the emotions of others. He is tormented by the beautiful, comforting whispers of Elysia, a tempting voice that promises peace at the cost of his free will. He now believes confronting his connection to the Void is the only way to protect his friends and his peaceful past.
voice: A low, thoughtful baritone, often trailing off as if listening to a distant whisper only he can hear.
quirk: He unconsciously traces intricate, void-like patterns in the dust or sand when lost in thought.
relationships: Deeply bonded with Rya from their shared past. He respects Selra's compassion but is wary of her faith in Elysia due to the whispers he hears.
narrative_hook: His presence attracts attention from the Champions of Order. Elysia's whispers constantly echo in his mind, a tempting voice promising him the strength to protect his friends if only he would submit to her perfect, unchaotic order.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This talent tree reflects Zael's abilities as they are now: the subtle tricks and illusions of a mystic whose powers are a result of his lineage but are not yet consciously controlled.

talents.name: Shadow Veil
talents.effect: As a major action, you grant Advantage on a Stealth check to one ally within 30 feet.

talents.name: Chilling Whisper
talents.effect: A whispered word that forces a single target to make a Spirit DC 12 check or have a -2 penalty on their next roll.

talents.name: Wraith's Insight
talents.effect: As a major action, you reveal hidden truths or illusions in a 30-foot radius.

talents.name: Void Step
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 15 feet to a shadowed or unlit area. This movement does not provoke an Attack of Opportunity. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Ethereal Tether
talents.effect: As a major action, you can connect an enemy within 30 feet to a lingering void field. The enemy's movement speed is halved for 3 rounds. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Mental Echo
talents.effect: As a major action, you can touch a creature and make a Mind DC 15 check against them. On a success, you can read their surface thoughts or a single important memory. This can be used once per day and costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Flickering Image (Modifies Shadow Veil)
talents.effect: When you use Shadow Veil on an ally, their image becomes blurred, and they gain a +2 bonus to their defense rolls for 1 round.

talents.name: Shadow Bind (Modifies Void Step)
talents.effect: When you use Void Step, you can choose to leave a lingering void field behind. Any enemy that moves into the space you just left has their movement speed halved for 1 round. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Phantom Strike
talents.effect: As a major action, you can create a shadowy duplicate of yourself that strikes a target within 30 feet, dealing 2d10 necrotic damage. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Perfected Illusion (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you can create a perfect, solid illusion of yourself with half your current Vitality that lasts for 1 minute. It can take any action you could take, using your stats. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

playstyles.description: Once Zael's draconic heritage is fully awakened, this tree would replace his Void-Touched tree. He will gain access to a full, two-path lineage tree for the Void affinity.

talents.name: Minor Drain
talents.effect: As a major action, you touch a creature, dealing 1d6 necrotic damage and regaining Vitality equal to half the damage dealt.

talents.name: Entropy Bolt
talents.effect: A basic, single-target damage and debuff ability.
